participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Energetic and passionate about music, Jordan thrives in urban settings and seeks meaningful connections.
participant_1.background: I'm not the healthiest person, but I do enjoy touring with Frank Ocean and I love ice cream. I need the energy of the city to fuel my never-ending work. my major is in business administration. I'm not interested in marriage, and archery is my passion. I'm still looking for someone to share my life with.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Caring and creative, Emily enjoys discovering new culinary delights and values her role as a mother.
participant_2.background: My parents are supportive of my career as a party planner, but they are worried about me being lonely. I love to cook and try new recipes, but I usually end up making campfire stew because it's my favorite. I'm a successful entrepreneur who has enough money to indulge my love of animals. My favorite place to eat is at home with my son. I would love to have lunch with my welding instructor, Mr.

content.text: Hey! What's up? I'm looking for someone to go to a concert with.
Hey! I'd be happy to go with you. What kind of music do you like?
I'm a big fan of Frank Ocean. He's coming to town next month and I really want to go.
Oh, I've never heard of him. What kind of music does he play?
He's a singer-songwriter. He makes a lot of different kinds of music, but it's all really good. You should check him out.
I will! I'm always looking for new music to listen to.
Great! So, are you free next month to go to the concert?
Yeah, I'm free. I'm really excited to see him live.
Me too! I've been wanting to see him for a long time.
This is going to be so much fun.
I know, right? I can't wait!
We should make a plan to meet up before the concert.
That's a great idea. I'll text you my number and we can figure out the details.
Sounds good. I'm looking forward to it.
